briefdescription.para: Silvair Enocean Proxy Server model entry.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Silvair EnOcean Server model instance.

briefdescription.para: Model entries for a button for a Silvair Enocean Proxy Server model.

detaileddescription.para: One of these should be added for each rocker switch handled by the Silvair Enocean Proxy Server instance, each on its own element. This macro includes the Generic Level Client and Generic OnOff Client.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to a Light Lightness Server model instance.
Button index for the model entries. Must be in the range 0 to BT_MESH_SILVAIR_ENOCEAN_PROXY_BUTTONS.

detaileddescription.para: Silvair Enocean Proxy Server state machine state
